original_text: Then the angel took the gold bowl and he filled it with fire from the altar. Then he threw it all down onto the earth. There were loud noises and the sound of thunder. There was bright lightning, like a very bad storm. The earth shook with an earthquake.
korean_text: 천사가 향로를 가지고 제단의 불을 담아다가 땅에 쏟으매 우레와 음성과 번개와 지진이 나더라

sentences.original_text: Then the angel took the gold bowl
and he filled it with fire from the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 제단에서 불을 그것에 채웠습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he threw it all down onto the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 그것 전부를 땅으로 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: The earth shook with an earthquake
